arg.jname: ボタン名 (日本語、省略可)

arg.name: arg 1
arg.jname: ボタン名 (日本語、省略可)

params.sqlcmd: "select " +" M_ITEM.\\"ITEM_CD\\" as \\"ITEM_CD\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"ITEM_NAME\\" as \\"ITEM_NAME\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"DRAW_CD\\" as \\"DRAW_CD\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"SPEC\\" as \\"SPEC\\", " +" TO_CHAR(M_ITEM.\\"HIGH_LEVEL_NO\\") as \\"HIGH_LEVEL_NO\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"ISSUE_TYP\\" as \\"ISSUE_TYP\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"OUTSIDE_TYP\\" as \\"OUTSIDE_TYP\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"STOCK_UNIT_FLG\\" as \\"STOCK_UNIT_FLG\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"STOCK_UNIT\\" as \\"STOCK_UNIT\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"PKG_UNIT\\" as \\"PKG_UNIT\\", " +" TO_CHAR(M_ITEM.\\"PKG_UNIT_QTY\\", 'FM99999999999990.0999') as \\"PKG_UNIT_QTY\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"UNIT_QTY_TYP\\" as \\"UNIT_QTY_TYP\\", " +" TO_CHAR(M_ITEM.\\"ODR_LT\\") as \\"ODR_LT\\", " +" TO_CHAR(M_ITEM.\\"ISSUE_LT\\") as \\"ISSUE_LT\\", " +" TO_CHAR(M_ITEM.\\"FIXED_LT\\") as \\"FIXED_LT\\", " +" TO_CHAR(M_ITEM.\\"PROP_LOT_SIZE\\", 'FM99999999999990.0999') as \\"PROP_LOT_SIZE\\", " +" TO_CHAR(M_ITEM.\\"PROP_LT\\") as \\"PROP_LT\\", " +" TO_CHAR(M_ITEM.\\"ITEM_SPOIL\\", 'FM99999999999990.0999') as \\"ITEM_SPOIL\\", " +" TO_CHAR(M_ITEM.\\"SAFETY_LT\\") as \\"SAFETY_LT\\", " +" TO_CHAR(M_ITEM.\\"SAFETY_STOCK\\", 'FM99999999999990.0999') as \\"SAFETY_STOCK\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"MRP_ODR_TYP\\" as \\"MRP_ODR_TYP\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"LOT_SIZING_TYP\\" as \\"LOT_SIZING_TYP\\", " +" TO_CHAR(M_ITEM.\\"MAX_PERIOD\\") as \\"MAX_PERIOD\\", " +" TO_CHAR(M_ITEM.\\"FIXED_ODR_QTY\\", 'FM99999999999990.0999') as \\"FIXED_ODR_QTY\\", " +" TO_CHAR(M_ITEM.\\"MAX_ODR_QTY\\", 'FM99999999999990.0999') as \\"MAX_ODR_QTY\\", " +" TO_CHAR(M_ITEM.\\"MIN_ODR_QTY\\", 'FM99999999999990.0999') as \\"MIN_ODR_QTY\\", " +" TO_CHAR(M_ITEM.\\"ODR_POINT\\", 'FM99999999999990.0999') as \\"ODR_POINT\\", " +" TO_CHAR(M_ITEM.\\"MUL_ODR_QTY\\", 'FM99999999999990.0999') as \\"MUL_ODR_QTY\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"MPS_FLG\\" as \\"MPS_FLG\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"ACPT_INSPC_TYP\\" as \\"ACPT_INSPC_TYP\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"PRODUCT_TYP\\" as \\"PRODUCT_TYP\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"CLASIFICATION_CD\\" as \\"CLASIFICATION_CD\\", " +" TO_CHAR(M_ITEM.\\"UNIT_WEIGHT\\", 'FM99999999999990.0999') as \\"UNIT_WEIGHT\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"ABC_TYP\\" as \\"ABC_TYP\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"OPR_RSLT_TYP\\" as \\"OPR_RSLT_TYP\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"SPL_ITEM_TYP\\" as \\"SPL_ITEM_TYP\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"TAX_CD\\" as \\"TAX_CD\\", " +" M_TAX.\\"TAX_NAME\\" as \\"TAX_NAME\\", " +" TO_CHAR(M_ITEM.\\"CAL_NO\\") as \\"CAL_NO\\", " +" M_CAL_H.\\"CAL_NAME\\" as \\"CAL_NAME\\", " +" TO_CHAR(M_ITEM.\\"MODIFY_COUNT\\") as \\"MODIFY_COUNT\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"ITEM_CLASS_01_CD\\" AS \\"ITEM_CLASS_01_CD\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"ITEM_CLASS_02_CD\\" AS \\"ITEM_CLASS_02_CD\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"ITEM_CLASS_03_CD\\" AS \\"ITEM_CLASS_03_CD\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"ITEM_CLASS_04_CD\\" AS \\"ITEM_CLASS_04_CD\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"ITEM_CLASS_05_CD\\" AS \\"ITEM_CLASS_05_CD\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"ITEM_CLASS_06_CD\\" AS \\"ITEM_CLASS_06_CD\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"ITEM_CLASS_07_CD\\" AS \\"ITEM_CLASS_07_CD\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"ITEM_CLASS_08_CD\\" AS \\"ITEM_CLASS_08_CD\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"ITEM_CLASS_09_CD\\" AS \\"ITEM_CLASS_09_CD\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"ITEM_CLASS_10_CD\\" AS \\"ITEM_CLASS_10_CD\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"ITEM_CLASS_11_CD\\" AS \\"ITEM_CLASS_11_CD\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"ITEM_CLASS_12_CD\\" AS \\"ITEM_CLASS_12_CD\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"DEPO_TYP\\" AS \\"DEPO_TYP\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"LOT_CTRL_FLG\\" AS \\"LOT_CTRL_FLG\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"LOT_NUMBERING_TYP\\" AS \\"LOT_NUMBERING_TYP\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"BEST_BEFORE_YEAR\\" AS \\"BEST_BEFORE_YEAR\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"BEST_BEFORE_MONTH\\" AS \\"BEST_BEFORE_MONTH\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"BEST_BEFORE_DAY\\" AS \\"BEST_BEFORE_DAY\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"REMARK1\\" AS \\"REMARK1\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"REMARK2\\" AS \\"REMARK2\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"MANHOUR_TYP\\" AS \\"MANHOUR_TYP\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"DEPT_CD\\" AS \\"DEPT_CD\\", " +" V_DEPT_CD.DEPT_NAME as \\"DEPT_NAME\\", " +" V_PJ_CD.DISPLAY_NAME as \\"PJ_CD\\", " +" V_SEG_CONTENTS_1.DISPLAY_NAME as \\"SEG_CONTENTS1\\", " +" V_SEG_CONTENTS_2.DISPLAY_NAME as \\"SEG_CONTENTS2\\", " +" V_SEG_CONTENTS_3.DISPLAY_NAME as \\"SEG_CONTENTS3\\", " +" V_SEG_CONTENTS_4.DISPLAY_NAME as \\"SEG_CONTENTS4\\" " +"from " +" M_ITEM, " +" M_TAX, " +" M_CAL_H, " +" V_DEPT_CD, " +" V_PJ_CD, " +" ( " +" SELECT " +" COMPANY_CD " +" FROM " +" SYS_MY_COMPANY " +" WHERE " +" CTRL_CD = 'SYSTEM' " +" ) SYS_MY_COMPANY, " +" V_SEG_CONTENTS_1, " +" V_SEG_CONTENTS_2, " +" V_SEG_CONTENTS_3, " +" V_SEG_CONTENTS_4 " +"where " +" M_ITEM.\\"ITEM_CD\\" = ? " +" and M_ITEM.\\"TAX_CD\\" = M_TAX.\\"TAX_CD\\"(+) " +" and M_ITEM.\\"CAL_NO\\" = M_CAL_H.\\"CAL_NO\\"(+) " +" and V_DEPT_CD.COMPANY_CD = SYS_MY_COMPANY.COMPANY_CD(+) " +" and M_ITEM.DEPT_CD = V_DEPT_CD.DEPT_CD(+) " +" and V_PJ_CD.VALUE = NVL(M_ITEM.PJ_CD, ' ') " +" and V_SEG_CONTENTS_1.VALUE = NVL(M_ITEM.SEG_CONTENTS1, ' ') " +" and V_SEG_CONTENTS_2.VALUE = NVL(M_ITEM.SEG_CONTENTS2, ' ') " +" and V_SEG_CONTENTS_3.VALUE = NVL(M_ITEM.SEG_CONTENTS3, ' ') " +" and V_SEG_CONTENTS_4.VALUE = NVL(M_ITEM.SEG_CONTENTS4, ' ')"

"insert into " +" M_ITEM(\\"ITEM_CD\\", \\"ITEM_NAME\\", \\"DRAW_CD\\", \\"SPEC\\", \\"HIGH_LEVEL_NO\\", \\"ISSUE_TYP\\", \\"OUTSIDE_TYP\\", \\"STOCK_UNIT_FLG\\", \\"STOCK_UNIT\\", \\"PKG_UNIT\\", \\"PKG_UNIT_QTY\\", \\"UNIT_QTY_TYP\\", \\"ODR_LT\\", \\"ISSUE_LT\\", \\"FIXED_LT\\", \\"PROP_LOT_SIZE\\", \\"PROP_LT\\", \\"ITEM_SPOIL\\", \\"SAFETY_LT\\", \\"SAFETY_STOCK\\", \\"MRP_ODR_TYP\\", \\"LOT_SIZING_TYP\\", \\"MAX_PERIOD\\", \\"FIXED_ODR_QTY\\", \\"MAX_ODR_QTY\\", \\"MIN_ODR_QTY\\", \\"ODR_POINT\\", \\"MUL_ODR_QTY\\", \\"MPS_FLG\\", \\"ACPT_INSPC_TYP\\", \\"PRODUCT_TYP\\", \\"CLASIFICATION_CD\\", \\"UNIT_WEIGHT\\", \\"ABC_TYP\\", \\"OPR_RSLT_TYP\\", \\"SPL_ITEM_TYP\\", \\"TAX_CD\\", \\"CAL_NO\\", \\"ITEM_CLASS_01_CD\\", \\"ITEM_CLASS_02_CD\\", \\"ITEM_CLASS_03_CD\\", \\"ITEM_CLASS_04_CD\\", \\"ITEM_CLASS_05_CD\\", \\"ITEM_CLASS_06_CD\\", \\"ITEM_CLASS_07_CD\\", \\"ITEM_CLASS_08_CD\\", \\"ITEM_CLASS_09_CD\\", \\"ITEM_CLASS_10_CD\\", \\"ITEM_CLASS_11_CD\\", \\"ITEM_CLASS_12_CD\\", \\"DEPO_TYP\\", \\"LOT_CTRL_FLG\\", \\"LOT_NUMBERING_TYP\\", \\"BEST_BEFORE_YEAR\\", \\"BEST_BEFORE_MONTH\\", \\"BEST_BEFORE_DAY\\", \\"REMARK1\\", \\"REMARK2\\", \\"MANHOUR_TYP\\", \\"DEPT_CD\\", \\"PJ_CD\\", \\"SEG_CONTENTS1\\", \\"SEG_CONTENTS2\\", \\"SEG_CONTENTS3\\", \\"SEG_CONTENTS4\\") " +"values " +" (?, ?, ?, ?, TO_NUMBER(?), ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, TO_NUMBER(?), ?, TO_NUMBER(?), TO_NUMBER(?), TO_NUMBER(?), TO_NUMBER(?), TO_NUMBER(?), TO_NUMBER(?), TO_NUMBER(?), TO_NUMBER(?), ?, ?, TO_NUMBER(?), TO_NUMBER(?), TO_NUMBER(?), TO_NUMBER(?), TO_NUMBER(?), TO_NUMBER(?), ?, ?, ?, ?, TO_NUMBER(?), ?, ?, ?, ?, TO_NUMBER(?), ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, DECODE(?, ' ', NULL, ?), DECODE(?, ' ', NULL, ?), DECODE(?, ' ', NULL, ?), DECODE(?, ' ', NULL, ?), DECODE(?, ' ', NULL, ?))"

"update " +" M_ITEM " +"set " +" \\"ITEM_CD\\" = ?, " +" \\"ITEM_NAME\\" = ?, " +" \\"DRAW_CD\\" = ?, " +" \\"SPEC\\" = ?, " +" \\"HIGH_LEVEL_NO\\" = TO_NUMBER(?), " +" \\"ISSUE_TYP\\" = ?, " +" \\"OUTSIDE_TYP\\" = ?, " +" \\"STOCK_UNIT_FLG\\" = ?, " +" \\"STOCK_UNIT\\" = ?, " +" \\"PKG_UNIT\\" = ?, " +" \\"PKG_UNIT_QTY\\" = TO_NUMBER(?), " +" \\"UNIT_QTY_TYP\\" = ?, " +" \\"ODR_LT\\" = TO_NUMBER(?), " +" \\"ISSUE_LT\\" = TO_NUMBER(?), " +" \\"FIXED_LT\\" = TO_NUMBER(?), " +" \\"PROP_LOT_SIZE\\" = TO_NUMBER(?), " +" \\"PROP_LT\\" = TO_NUMBER(?), " +" \\"ITEM_SPOIL\\" = TO_NUMBER(?), " +" \\"SAFETY_LT\\" = TO_NUMBER(?), " +" \\"SAFETY_STOCK\\" = TO_NUMBER(?), " +" \\"MRP_ODR_TYP\\" = ?, " +" \\"LOT_SIZING_TYP\\" = ?, " +" \\"MAX_PERIOD\\" = TO_NUMBER(?), " +" \\"FIXED_ODR_QTY\\" = TO_NUMBER(?), " +" \\"MAX_ODR_QTY\\" = TO_NUMBER(?), " +" \\"MIN_ODR_QTY\\" = TO_NUMBER(?), " +" \\"ODR_POINT\\" = TO_NUMBER(?), " +" \\"MUL_ODR_QTY\\" = TO_NUMBER(?), " +" \\"MPS_FLG\\" = ?, " +" \\"ACPT_INSPC_TYP\\" = ?, " +" \\"PRODUCT_TYP\\" = ?, " +" \\"CLASIFICATION_CD\\" = ?, " +" \\"UNIT_WEIGHT\\" = TO_NUMBER(?), " +" \\"ABC_TYP\\" = ?, " +" \\"OPR_RSLT_TYP\\" = ?, " +" \\"SPL_ITEM_TYP\\" = ?, " +" \\"TAX_CD\\" = ?, " +" \\"CAL_NO\\" = TO_NUMBER(?), " +" \\"ITEM_CLASS_01_CD\\" = ?, " +" \\"ITEM_CLASS_02_CD\\" = ?, " +" \\"ITEM_CLASS_03_CD\\" = ?, " +" \\"ITEM_CLASS_04_CD\\" = ?, " +" \\"ITEM_CLASS_05_CD\\" = ?, " +" \\"ITEM_CLASS_06_CD\\" = ?, " +" \\"ITEM_CLASS_07_CD\\" = ?, " +" \\"ITEM_CLASS_08_CD\\" = ?, " +" \\"ITEM_CLASS_09_CD\\" = ?, " +" \\"ITEM_CLASS_10_CD\\" = ?, " +" \\"ITEM_CLASS_11_CD\\" = ?, " +" \\"ITEM_CLASS_12_CD\\" = ?, " +" \\"DEPO_TYP\\" = ?, " +" \\"LOT_CTRL_FLG\\" = ?, " +" \\"LOT_NUMBERING_TYP\\" = ?, " +" \\"BEST_BEFORE_YEAR\\" = ?, " +" \\"BEST_BEFORE_MONTH\\" = ?, " +" \\"BEST_BEFORE_DAY\\" = ?, " +" \\"REMARK1\\" = ?, " +" \\"REMARK2\\" = ?, " +" \\"MANHOUR_TYP\\" = ?, " +" \\"DEPT_CD\\" = ?, " +" \\"PJ_CD\\" = DECODE(?, ' ', NULL, ?), " +" \\"SEG_CONTENTS1\\" = DECODE(?, ' ', NULL, ?), " +" \\"SEG_CONTENTS2\\" = DECODE(?, ' ', NULL, ?), " +" \\"SEG_CONTENTS3\\" = DECODE(?, ' ', NULL, ?), " +" \\"SEG_CONTENTS4\\" = DECODE(?, ' ', NULL, ?) " +"where " +" M_ITEM.\\"ITEM_CD\\" = ?"
"select " +" M_ITEM.\\"MODIFY_COUNT\\" as \\"MODIFY_COUNT\\" " +"from " +" M_ITEM " +"where " +" M_ITEM.\\"ITEM_CD\\" = ? " +"for update nowait"
"select " +" M_TAX.\\"TAX_CD\\" as \\"TAX_CD\\", " +" M_TAX.\\"TAX_NAME\\" as \\"TAX_NAME\\" " +"from " +" M_TAX " +"where " +" M_TAX.\\"TAX_CD\\" = ?"
"select " +" M_PS.\\"PARENT_ITEM_CD\\" as \\"PARENT_ITEM_CD\\" " +"from " +" M_PS " +"where " +" M_PS.\\"PARENT_ITEM_CD\\" = ? " +" or M_PS.\\"COMP_ITEM_CD\\" = ?"
"select " +" M_ITEM.\\"ITEM_CD\\" as \\"ITEM_CD\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"MRP_ODR_TYP\\" as \\"MRP_ODR_TYP\\" " +"from " +" M_ITEM " +"where " +" M_ITEM.\\"ITEM_CD\\" = ?"

"select distinct " +" T_OD.\\"ITEM_CD\\" as \\"ITEM_CD\\", " +" T_JOB_ODR_CD_STOCK.\\"ITEM_CD\\" as \\"ITEM_CD\\", " +" T_ITEM_STOCK.\\"ITEM_CD\\" as \\"ITEM_CD\\" " +"from " +" T_OD, " +" T_JOB_ODR_CD_STOCK, " +" T_ITEM_STOCK, " +" M_ITEM " +"where " +" (M_ITEM.\\"ITEM_CD\\" = T_OD.\\"ITEM_CD\\" " +" or M_ITEM.\\"ITEM_CD\\" = T_JOB_ODR_CD_STOCK.\\"ITEM_CD\\" " +" or M_ITEM.\\"ITEM_CD\\" = T_ITEM_STOCK.\\"ITEM_CD\\") " +" and M_ITEM.\\"ITEM_CD\\" = ?"

"select " +" m_proc_grp.\\"PLANT_CD\\" as \\"PLANT_CD\\", " +" sum(m_proc_grp.\\"PROP_LT\\") as \\"SUM_PROP_LT\\", " +" sum(m_proc_grp.\\"FIXED_LT\\") as \\"SUM_FIXED_LT\\" " +"from " +" m_proc_grp " +"where " +" m_proc_grp.\\"ITEM_CD\\" = ? " +"group by " +" \\"ITEM_CD\\", " +" \\"PLANT_CD\\""
"SELECT " +" M_CAL_H.\\"CAL_NO\\" AS \\"CAL_NO\\", " +" M_CAL_H.\\"CAL_NAME\\" AS \\"CAL_NAME\\" " +"FROM " +" M_CAL_H " +"WHERE " +" M_CAL_H.\\"CAL_NO\\" = TO_NUMBER(?)"
"select " +" T_OD.ITEM_CD as ITEM_CD " +"from " +" T_OD, " +" M_ITEM " +"where " +" M_ITEM.ITEM_CD = T_OD.ITEM_CD " +" and M_ITEM.ITEM_CD = ?"
"select " +" T_JOB_ODR_CD_STOCK.ITEM_CD as ITEM_CD " +"from " +" T_JOB_ODR_CD_STOCK, " +" M_ITEM " +"where " +" M_ITEM.ITEM_CD = T_JOB_ODR_CD_STOCK.ITEM_CD " +" and M_ITEM.ITEM_CD = ?"
"select " +" T_ITEM_STOCK.ITEM_CD as ITEM_CD " +"from " +" T_ITEM_STOCK, " +" M_ITEM " +"where " +" M_ITEM.ITEM_CD = T_ITEM_STOCK.ITEM_CD " +" and M_ITEM.ITEM_CD = ?"
"SELECT " +" ITEM_CD " +"FROM " +" T_JOB_ODR " +"WHERE " +" (JOB_ODR_STS_TYP = 1 " +" OR JOB_ODR_STS_TYP = 2) " +" AND JOB_ODR_DEL_FLG = 0 " +" AND ITEM_CD = ?"
"SELECT " +" M_PROC_GRP.\\"ITEM_CD\\" AS \\"ITEM_CD\\" " +"FROM " +" M_PROC_GRP " +"WHERE " +" M_PROC_GRP.\\"ITEM_CD\\" = ? " +" AND M_PROC_GRP.\\"OUTSIDE_TYP\\" = 2"

"SELECT " +" SYS_TYPE_VALUE.\\"DISPLAY_NAME\\" AS \\"DISPLAY_NAME\\" " +"FROM " +" SYS_TYPE_VALUE " +"WHERE " +" SYS_TYPE_VALUE.\\"VALUE\\" = TO_NUMBER(?) " +" AND SYS_TYPE_VALUE.\\"NAME\\" = 'MRP_ODR_TYP'"

"SELECT " +" V_DEPT_CD.COMPANY_CD, " +" V_DEPT_CD.DEPT_CD, " +" V_DEPT_CD.DEPT_NAME " +"FROM " +" V_DEPT_CD, " +" ( " +" SELECT " +" COMPANY_CD " +" FROM " +" SYS_MY_COMPANY " +" WHERE " +" CTRL_CD = 'SYSTEM' " +" ) SYS_MY_COMPANY " +"WHERE " +" V_DEPT_CD.COMPANY_CD = SYS_MY_COMPANY.COMPANY_CD " +" AND V_DEPT_CD.DEPT_CD = ?"

cell.name: SUM_PROP_LT
cell.description: 工場ごとの比例リードタイム合計

cell.name: SUM_FIXED_LT
cell.description: 工場ごとの固定リードタイム合計
